alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern Pope County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Logan, southeastern Johnson and northwestern Pope Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Knoxville, or 10 miles southeast of Clarksville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Clarksville... Lamar... Dover... London... Knoxville... Broomfield... Taral... Holman... Lake Dardanelle... Augsburg... Lutherville... Long Pool Campground... Piney Bay Recreation Area... Treat... Pleasant Valley in Pope County... Gum Log... Scottsville... Hillcrest in Johnson County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
